alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 4:57PM CDT until May 27 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Fish River Near Silverhill affecting Baldwin County. For the Fish River...including Silverhill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fish River Near Silverhill. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage, County Road 48 floods at Bohemian Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday evening and continue rising to a crest of 11.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage by Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
